t: Visual Search
s: Tap on the ‘Upload a photo’ button and select an image or a screenshot to shop similar products on Amazon. On uploading an image, you will see one dot for each item we detected. You can also circle around an item to search. To search a specific item in the photo, you can circle around the item. In cases the item is blurry or too small, we may not be able to recognize it. You can add text in the search bar to specify brand...
